seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Data Engineer' without explicit seniority qualifiers, and the minimum years of experience mentioned is 3 years, which aligns with mid-level roles in the IC hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Business Intelligence', and the core responsibilities focus on reporting, visualization, and BI tools like Cognos.

sub_specialty.evidence: Required expertise in ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) and BI DW projects suggests a focus on batch ETL.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include development, testing, and troubleshooting but no explicit mention of technical leadership or people management.

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) are mentioned in preferred experience, but no single cloud is emphasized as primary.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Azure, and Google (assumed GCP) are listed as preferred or mentioned in ETL tools.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL/Data Integration tools and BI DW projects suggests batch processing, with no explicit mention of streaming or real-time paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

storage_layer.evidence: Core focus on BI DW projects and Cognos suggests a data warehouse storage layer, though no explicit tools are mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India', which implies a regional restriction unless otherwise stated.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, but no relocation package or requirement is mentioned, suggesting the candidate must already be based there.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship is mentioned in Pass 1 results or the job posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Job posting specifies full-time education (MCA/M. Tech/B. Tech/B.E.), which may not align with OPT/CPT eligibility unless explicitly stated.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements are discussed in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is stated as 'full_time', and benefits are typically associated with W2 roles in India (though contract type is not explicitly mentioned).

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are mentioned in Pass 1 results or the job posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied career growth paths or tracks are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Job posting mentions working in a team with 'business and technical members', which may include collaboration with senior team members.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion or advancement paths in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, etc.) are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Job posting specifies 'minimum of 3 years' and full-time education as 'required', with a long list of must-have hard skills.

scope_definition.evidence: Job responsibilities are well-defined and focused on BI DW projects, reporting, and visualization using Cognos.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with mid-level seniority (3 years of experience, no unrealistic skill combinations).
